Class SerializerCallback

java.lang.Object
  org.magnos.io.bytes.SerializerCallback
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class SerializerCallback
extends java.lang.Object
implements ByteReader.ReadCallback<java.lang.Object>, ByteWriter.WriteCallback<java.lang.Object>

A callback for serializing and deserializing between bytes and Objects

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer

public java.lang.Object read(ByteReader reader)
Deserializes an Object from the given ByteReader.

Specified by:
read in interface ByteReader.ReadCallback<java.lang.Object>
Parameters:
reader - The ByteReader to read from.
Returns:
The deserialized item, or null if the reader did not contain enough data (optional, this will be detected anyway).
